1: How much are you limited by shortness of breath or fatigue in your ability to shower or bathe?
2: "On a scale of 0 to 10, how much are you limited by shortness of breath or fatigue in your ability to walk one block on level ground?"
3: "To what extent are you limited by shortness of breath or fatigue when hurrying or jogging?"
4: Over the past 2 weeks, how many times have you experienced swelling in your feet, ankles, or legs upon waking up in the morning?
5: "Over the past two weeks, on average, how many times has fatigue limited your ability to do what you wanted?"
6: "Over the past two weeks, on average, how many times has shortness of breath limited your ability to do what you wanted?"
7: Over the past 2 weeks, on average, how many times have you been forced to sleep sitting up in a chair or with at least 3 pillows to prop you up due to shortness of breath?
8: Over the past 2 weeks, how much have your symptoms limited your enjoyment of life?
9: How would you feel about having to live with your current symptoms for the rest of your life?
10: How do your symptoms limit your hobbies and recreational activities?
11: How do your symptoms limit your ability to work or do household chores?
12: How do your symptoms limit your ability to visit your family or friends?
